answers.answer: Yes, the antibiotic treatments for TB will cause hepatic stress. His doctors will need to make the treatment continuation decision but it is certainly a balancing act. Hopefully your grandfather's liver is otherwise healthy and can withstand this temporary stress. It will recover once the treatments are complete. Take care.

title: Elevated sgot and sgpt during ptb treatment
